original: Is NOT old enough to Marry
This councilor is currently not forbidden to lead armies.\n§GClick to recall and forbid your councilor from leading armies.§!
translation: 这位内阁成员现在被允许带领军队。\n§G点击此处召回此人并禁止其领军。§!

original: This councilor is currently forbidden to lead armies.\n§GClick to allow this councilor to lead armies.§!
translation: 这位内阁成员现在被禁止带领军队。\n§G点击此处允许其领军§!

original: §Y[Recipient.GetFirstName] will be released from prison if [Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun] accepts.§!

My dear [Root.GetTitle],

I have learned that there are certain factions within the realm working to undermine my rule. If you are involved or planning to become so, I trust that your complicity in these matters ends now.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我亲爱的[Root.GetTitle]，

我已经知道在我的领地内有某些派系正在破坏我的统治。如果你参与了或者打算这么做，我相信你现在会打消这个念头。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Ha! This letter was an act of desperation.

translation: 你送出了一封礼貌的请求书。

original:
Honored [Root.GetTitle],

Fine! I do not like this, but for the sake of the continued prosperity of the realm, I will agree to support any faction of yours. Please don't make me regret this.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

好吧！我不喜欢这个，但是为了国家的长久繁荣，我会支持你所有的派系。不要让我后悔自己的决定。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Would you like to help us improve Crusader Kings II by collecting data on playing habits and the popularity of downloadable content and mods? If you agree, anonymous data concerning Crusader Kings II will be sent to Paradox Interactive when you play the game. Paradox Interactive will not and can not use this data to find out anything about the users.
translation: 你愿意通过收集游戏习惯和可下载内容及 MOD 的受欢迎程度的数据来帮助我们改善《王国风云II》吗？如果你同意，有关《王国风云II》的匿名数据将会在你进行游戏时发给 Paradox Interactive。Paradox Interactive 不会也不能通过使用这些数据来获取用户的任何信息。

original: Help us Improve Crusader Kings II?
translation: 帮助我们改进《王国风云II》？
